title: T206 Ed Walsh SGC 3 Piedmont 350 for Sale / Trade

posts.post_title: T206 Ed Walsh SGC 3 Piedmont 350 for Sale / Trade
posts.post_content:
Gorgeous card!  Vibrant green color, no wear or wrinkling with nice centering as well!  Sharp photo.  Asking $800 delivered or trade for n300 Mayo's or e107s

Thanks in advance!
Brian
